data.name: PARADOX
data.detailed_description:
STORY MODE
A twisted experience and look into the shattered mind of a lost soul-
Paradox narrative follows a man named Richard who has found himself in the ultimate trial, swaying him to place his blind faith in a strange man and a lost little girl for guidance. A world of mystery, torment and loss opening it's maw to you guiding through to recall the memories of your own life as you are trapped in a paradox of dreams within dreams while at mercy of a higher force; Will you be able to save yourself, or is someone else more worth saving?
The Story mode of Paradox isn't the end however, as more chapters and entire new stories will be added to show the future of the world after it's left in a fragile state, However this is just the beginning..



PURGATORY
Following the release of the Paradox story experience, we will be introducing a Multiplayer Co-Op Horror survival mode, where you and a group of friends or strangers must set out to prolong the inevitable end by gathering weapons, supplies and doing rituals to hold back the shadows beyond.
Purgatory hopes to be a completely unique, Open World Horror experience; Survive and build on your own, or bring your friends through the Void of Purgatory in hopes to free lost souls trapped for what feels like an eternity.. Loot Houses, gather equipment and pray the darkness is not hungry for flesh. Over all modes, complete challenges and Achievements to unlock in game rewards to aid survival or building, and experience much more.. With up to 4 players, this mode will be everything from a horror experience for the whole squad, to a suspenseful night on prowl as you approach your next objective, to a frantic climax as your cover is finally blown... Endless possibilities are the plan for Purgatory, but the question is; How would you spend your last days in Purgatory?
The Choice, is yours...

data.short_description: A new take on a classic horror experience, solve puzzles and follow broken memories to uncover the darkest secrets of your own mental prison.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Sound Card is applicable

*There are depictions of Medical usage of Drugs.
* Blood, Violence and Gore are occasionally featured.
